data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Bouira.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Bouira, Algeria
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 695,600 people living in Bouira, Algeria. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Bouira, Algeria.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Father, encourage your church in Bouira that you never forsake them.
data.verse: Those who know your name will put their trust in you, for you, Yahweh, have not forsaken those who seek you.

data.prayer: Jesus, I pray that all the Bedouin, Tajakant people will remember and turn to you, Lord God. May all the Bedouin, Tajakant people worship before you. For the kingdom of the Bedouin, Tajakant people is yours.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Bouira who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
God, we pray for the believers in Bouira, Algeria that they will know how to spend an hour in prayer with you.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Bouira
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

location.name: Bouira
location.cities_list: Lakhdaria, Bouïra, Sour el Ghozlane, Aïn Bessem, Chorfa
location.cities_list_w_pop: Lakhdaria (56,719), Bouïra (52,500), Sour el Ghozlane (50,204), Aïn Bessem (29,461), Chorfa (20,556)
